last_episode_to_air.name: Emotional triumph for Trident
last_episode_to_air.overview: Richard Verschoor secures pole position for Trident on the streets of Baku. F2 also welcomes multiple F3 graduates including Christian Mansell, who make their debuts on the challenging circuit.

name: F2: Chasing the Dream
overview: Follow the Formula 2 drivers on their Road to F1 as they chase the ultimate goal: a seat in the pinnacle of motorsport. Witness first-hand the unwavering commitment of the racers: the passion, the tension, and the hope that they carry with them around some of the world’s most challenging circuits when they step into the cockpit.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
"Formula 2 is the best single-make championship anywhere on earth"

See the stars of tomorrow like never before, as we get closer to the FIA Formula 2 Championship. Available worldwide on F1 TV.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: From the pains, and the pros, of living up to a famous name – in the case of drivers like Pedro Piquet, Giuliano Alesi and eventual 2020 champion Mick Schumacher – to the constant pressure of trying to impress F1’s kingmakers and take that ultimate step up the single-seater ladder, the six episodes of F2: Chasing The Dream lift the curtain on what it’s really like to race in one of the world’s most hotly-contested motorsport series.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The fly-on-the-wall look at the rising stars of Formula 2 returns in 2022 with nine episodes set to be released as the 2022 campaign continues, the most of any season so far.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview:
You thought you'd have to wait until the end of the year? Chasing The Dream is here!

With episodes added after each race, Season 5 of the show is set to take viewers behind-the-scenes and closer to the action than ever before. Fans will now see how a race weekend unfolds in the garages and the paddock amid the pressures of achieving success and making the dream step up to the Formula 1 grid.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The fly on the wall series following Formula 2 returns in 2024.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: All eyes are on the start of the 2019 F2 season when a Schumacher joins the most competitive series in the world.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Nyck de Vries begins his championship surge whilst rookie Anthoine Hubert stars when the drivers take to the streets of Monaco.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The championship battle intensifies as the season approaches the summer break.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: One of motorsports brightest stars, Anthoine Hubert, is remembered after tragically losing his life at Spa.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Dutchman Nyck de Vries looks to seal the championship with just two rounds remaining.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview:
"Formula 2 is the best single-make championship anywhere on earth"

See the stars of tomorrow like never before, as we get closer to the FIA Formula 2 Championship. Available worldwide on F1 TV.

episodes.name: A Slow Start
episodes.overview: A new season begins in Formula 2 - the last step on the road to F1. Watch how revised plans for the delayed 2020 season begin to take shape and racing resumes following a slow start.

episodes.name: The New Order
episodes.overview: Visit Carlin HQ as F2’s drivers battle against the elements, delve into the Formula 1 Driver Academies and meet the outstanding rookies for the 2020 F2 season. It’s time for the new order.

episodes.name: Staking a Claim
episodes.overview: Join title contender Callum Ilott at the UNI-Virtuosi factory in the lead up to a triple header. With the Championship wide open, the front runners for the F2 title are staking a claim.

episodes.name: Return to Spa
episodes.overview: The motor racing community welcomes back Juan Manuel Correa on his road to recovery, and remembers the much-loved Anthoine Hubert during a return to Spa.

episodes.name: Racing DNA
episodes.overview: Is having a famous name a blessing or a curse? Alex Jacques and Alex Brundle discuss a new generation of drivers following in their father's footsteps and testing their racing DNA.

episodes.name: A New Champion
episodes.overview: Visit the PREMA factory where the team hope to deliver an epic conclusion to the season. And after a fierce multi-driver battle, watch dreams come true with the crowning of a new champion.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: From the pains, and the pros, of living up to a famous name – in the case of drivers like Pedro Piquet, Giuliano Alesi and eventual 2020 champion Mick Schumacher – to the constant pressure of trying to impress F1’s kingmakers and take that ultimate step up the single-seater ladder, the six episodes of F2: Chasing The Dream lift the curtain on what it’s really like to race in one of the world’s most hotly-contested motorsport series.

episodes.name: Year of the Tiger
episodes.overview: As the world's most talented young drivers take to the track once again, Zhou Guanyu intends to use his third season in F2 to show why he deserves to go to Formula 1.

episodes.name: Street Fighters
episodes.overview: It's a battle in the streets, with the barriers leading to defeat. Among those enduring the highs and lows, Theo Pourchaire goes from breaking records to breaking bones.

episodes.name: F1 or Bust!
episodes.overview: Fans are in the stands to watch the British driver, Dan Ticktum, at his home race. On and off track, Dan battles to show the F1 world why he deserves a shot.

episodes.name: Not Bad... for a Rookie
episodes.overview: Prema protege Oscar Piastri hopes to follow in the footsteps of fellow Aussie, Mark Webber. How will he ever repay his countryman for passing down his own brand of gritty wisdom?

episodes.name: The New Generation
episodes.overview: Discover the F3 drivers pushing to take the next step. Juan Manuel Correa makes his incredible return to racing, while Dennis Hauger and Jack Doohan are in a fierce battle for the title.

episodes.name: Destined for Greatness
episodes.overview: Oscar Piastri has a commanding championship lead going into the final two race weekends but can his success also secure the ultimate prize, a seat in Formula 1?

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: The Formula 2 season gets underway with 22 of the most exciting young drivers hoping to make the perfect start. Jack Doohan impresses with his pure pace whilst French favourite, Theo Pourchaire, demonstrates why he is one to watch.

episodes.name: The Boy from Brazil
episodes.overview: Felipe Drugovich begins his 3rd season on the F2 grid in style. With his dream of becoming Brazil's next Formula 1 World champion, he’s fully focused on keeping it consistent.

episodes.name: The Magic City
episodes.overview: Enzo Fittipaldi, Logan Sargeant and Juan Manuel Correa all began their karting in Miami, Florida and with the inaugural F1 race taking place there, they head home to soak up the atmosphere and reflect on the journey they’ve been on so far.

episodes.name: Shoot for the Moon
episodes.overview: Ralph Boschung fights back from a serious neck injury as Frederik Vesti continues to show his potential.

episodes.name: Dutch Passion
episodes.overview: Richard Verschoor finally has a full-time F2 seat and is able to deliver a first F2 win for the team! He goes into his Dutch Grand Prix full of confidence alongside Dutch team MP Motorsport - who are currently top of the standings

episodes.name: Campeão
episodes.overview: Arriving at Monza, the points have all but confirmed Felipe Drugovich as the victor in 2022, but closest rival Théo Pourchaire aims to delay the coronation for as long as possible.

episodes.name: Women in Motorsport
episodes.overview: After an emotional return to F2 at Spa, we catch up with Tatiana Calderón, joining her at Magny-Cours for the Women's F3 Test Day to discuss women in motorsport and to meet four drivers all chasing the dream of one day reaching Formula 1.

episodes.name: Single Seater Hope
episodes.overview: Dennis Hauger, the Norwegian F1 hopeful, entered Formula 2 as the reigning F3 champion, but the season hasn't begun as he'd hoped. Dennis reflects on his journey to where he is now and hopes to end the year strong.

episodes.name: Dare To Be Great
episodes.overview: As the 2022 FIA Formula 2 season comes to a close, we reflect on the highs and lows of another incredible season, and keep an eye on American driver Logan Sargeant's quest for critical Super Licence points to become a Williams F1 driver in 2023.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: The fly-on-the-wall look at the rising stars of Formula 2 returns in 2022 with nine episodes set to be released as the 2022 campaign continues, the most of any season so far.

episodes.name: Sensational Season Opener! (2023 Bahrain Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: In Bahrain we look at Pourchaire as he aims for the perfect start, MP Motorsport's championship defence and the rookies getting up to speed with F2!

episodes.name: Hitting The Streets! (2023 Saudi Arabian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Take a glimpse behind the scenes of Formula 2 as our drivers get to grips with the fastest street circuit in the world!

episodes.name: Debut Down Under! (2023 Australian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Formula 2 goes to Australia for the very first time as we focus on the fortunes of Ayumu Iwasa and Arthur Leclerc with the DAMS team. A victory for Iwasa would take him to the top of the championship, while Leclerc is looking for his first podium in his rookie season.

episodes.name: Riding The Wave - Bonus Episode!
episodes.overview: Fresh from his home round, Formula 2's only Australian racer Jack Doohan heads home to surf and catch up with family and friends.

episodes.name: Street Racing (2023 Azerbaijan Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Formula 2 took to the Baku streets for its fourth round as we go behind the scenes with Van Amersfoort Racing and their drivers Juan Manuel Correa and Richard Verschoor... and checking in on Ollie Bearman too!

episodes.name: The Magic Of Monaco (2023 Monaco Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: F2 takes to the streets of one of the most famous circuits in the world. Take a peek behind the scenes as the next generation races around Monaco.

episodes.name: Homecoming (2023 Spanish Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Join Campos as they navigate the challenging Barcelona Grand Prix. Follow their resilient drivers, Kush Maini and Ralph Boschung as they battle the conditions, while F3 driver, Josep Maria Marti shines with a remarkable triumph at his home Grand Prix.

episodes.name: Battling Bulls (2023 Austrian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Follow Rodin Carlin duo and Red Bull Racing juniors Enzo Fittipaldi and Zane Maloney as they compete at the Red Bull Ring for Round 8 of the 2023 FIA Formula 2 season!

episodes.name: At Home With Hitech Pulse-Eight (2023 British Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Watch Hitech Pulse-Eight’s rookies, Jak Crawford and Isack Hadjar as they go racing on the legendary Silverstone Circuit. Can Crawford follow on from a successful Spielberg and will Hadjar show his true talent at one of his favourite tracks?

episodes.name: A Home Away From Home (2023 Hungarian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Roy Nissany guides team mate Brad Benavides around the iconic Hungaroring, a track that holds a special place in Nissany's heart.

episodes.name: Shifting Fortunes (2023 Belgian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Jack Doohan and Armaury Cordeel take on the challenging Spa circuit in wet conditions. The Invicta Virtuosi Racing team share the highs and lows at Cordeel's home race and where Doohan is trying to get back into the Championship fight.

episodes.name: Storms And Stroopwafels (2023 Dutch Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: As the Formula 2 season title fight heats up, the drivers are not only battling each other but also contending with the unpredictable weather at the iconic Zandvoort circuit.

episodes.name: In It To Win It (2023 Italian Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: As the penultimate round of the F2 season unfolded at Monza, it unleashed a tempest of excitement, showcasing the monumental title showdown between Fred Vesti and Theo Pourchaire, the spectacular debut of the 2024 F2 car, the crowning of a brand-new F3 champion, and the heart-pounding victory of Ollie Bearman

episodes.name: Eye Of The Storm (Bonus Episode)
episodes.overview: Catch up with Theo Pourchaire, Frederik Vesti, Victor Martins and Oliver Bearman as they prepare for the final F2 round in Abu Dhabi.

episodes.name: The Final Showdown (2023 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix)
episodes.overview: Frederik Vesti and Theo Pourchaire, prepare for an intense final showdown as the 2023 F2 Championship battle reaches a riveting climax.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview:
You thought you'd have to wait until the end of the year? Chasing The Dream is here!

With episodes added after each race, Season 5 of the show is set to take viewers behind-the-scenes and closer to the action than ever before. Fans will now see how a race weekend unfolds in the garages and the paddock amid the pressures of achieving success and making the dream step up to the Formula 1 grid.

episodes.name: First look at the class of 24
episodes.overview: Buckle up as the 2024 Formula 2 grid get their first taste of the brand-new car in pre-season testing. Enjoy exclusive access to both the Barcelona Shakedown and Bahrain Testing and hear from these rising stars as they ignite their F1 dreams!

episodes.name: Zane reigns in Bahrain
episodes.overview: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the Formula 2 opening weekend in Bahrain with exclusive behind-the-scenes access with ART drivers Victor Martins and Zak O'Sullivan And get ready to witness the awe-inspiring mastery of Zane Maloney as he delivers a standout performance, making this race weekend an unforgettable spectacle.

episodes.name: Surprises in Saudi
episodes.overview: Get ready to re-live the adrenaline-fueled chaos of a Formula 2 race weekend in Jeddah! Watch as Ollie Bearman secures pole position before making his leap to Formula 1, while Zane Maloney fights back from a poor qualifying to defend his championship lead, and witness Enzo Fittipaldi’s remarkable comeback story unfold on the track.

episodes.name: PREMA fight in Melbourne
episodes.overview: Check-in with PREMA drivers, rising star Andrea Kimi Antonelli, and Oliver Bearman after his impressive F1 debut, and watch how Isack Hadjar impresses on the tricky Melbourne circuit.

episodes.name: Colapinto stakes his claim
episodes.overview: Drama and action as F2 returns at Imola. A last lap twist as rookies Franco Colapinto and Paul Aron battle wheel to wheel during the Sprint.

episodes.name: Win or bust in Monte Carlo
episodes.overview: Cameras are with Campos Racing throughout the weekend, with Josep María Martí targeting a stronger weekend to arrest a difficult patch of form. Meanwhile teammate Isack Hadjar battles for the lead of the Drivers’ Championship.

episodes.name: Correa's Catalan Comeback
episodes.overview: An important moment for Juan Manual Correa as he makes it back onto the podium after an incredibly tough 5 years.

episodes.name: Bortoleto stars in Austria
episodes.overview: Gabriel Bortoleto seals maiden Formula 2 victory in Spielberg.

episodes.name: Shining at Silverstone
episodes.overview: Hitech's Paul Aron fights to maintain his championship lead, while Ollie Bearman celebrates his signing with Haas. Andrea Kimi Antonelli secures his first F2 win, and Isack Hadjar delivers a stellar performance in the wet conditions at Silverstone.

episodes.name: A Star Rises
episodes.overview: PREMA's Andrea Kimi Antonelli seeks a first F2 Feature Race victory in Budapest.

episodes.name: Hadjar's Spa breakaway
episodes.overview: Formula 2 title contenders battle it out at Spa-Francorchamps. Will they rise to the challenge or succumb to the pressure on this legendary circuit?

episodes.name: Magnificent Monza
episodes.overview: Join Enzo Fittipaldi and Rafa Villagómez on a thrilling ride around the legendary Temple of Speed and Gabriel Bortoleto's championship dreams take flight.

episodes.name: Emotional triumph for Trident
episodes.overview: Richard Verschoor secures pole position for Trident on the streets of Baku. F2 also welcomes multiple F3 graduates including Christian Mansell, who make their debuts on the challenging circuit.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The fly on the wall series following Formula 2 returns in 2024.
